entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers early this evening. Otherwise clear. Fog patches developing before morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Sunny in the morning and early in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers late in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. High plus 5. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Clearing in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Sunday 2 April 2023
